Posts.EditableText: http://www.mrpge.chronicalgames.com Released the first version of my Open Source Online RPG Engine. There will be a compiled version soon for non-programmers, and already Moonripper has begun programming M:RPGe 2, which will be a closed source DX8 powered Online RPG Creation Kit. v0.1.0 of M:RPGe is pretty buggy, but Draub is clearing up most of the bugs, for the 'Rev 001' release. Enjoy
Posts.HTML:
http://www.mrpge.chronicalgames.com

Released the first version of my Open Source Online RPG Engine. There will be a compiled version soon for non-programmers, and already Moonripper has begun programming M:RPGe 2, which will be a closed source DX8 powered Online RPG Creation Kit.

v0.1.0 of M:RPGe is pretty buggy, but Draub is clearing up most of the bugs, for the 'Rev 001' release. Enjoy

Posts.EditableText: Finally!  You've been going on about this thing for months!  I'll check it out after christmas.
Posts.HTML: Finally!  You've been going on about this thing for months!  I'll check it out after christmas.
